name: LOOP (Chalo Rivas)
description:
This is my entry for the Ludum Dare Game Jam  nº47

Controls: 

  • Movement: WASD / arow keys and spacebar
  • Confirm: X

Credits:

  • The game was made with Gdevelop at a 160x144 resolution
  • Assets made by me using Pixel studio.
  • SFX  made by me using BFXR

Social Media
